title: Definitions
context: PART IX. ASSISTANCE TO SMALL BUSINESSES §103D-901 Definitions. As used in this part, unless the context clearly requires otherwise: &ldquo;Geographic bidding&rdquo; includes the use of a competitive solicitation which provides for one or more contracts to be awarded on a regional or geographic basis with the State. &ldquo;Small business&rdquo; means a business that is independently owned and defined by detailed criteria pursuant to rules adopted by the policy board. The policy board shall adopt rules defining &ldquo;small business&rdquo; through detailed criteria that may include the number of employees and similar factors used by the United States Small Business Administration. [L Sp 1993, c 8, pt of §2; am L 1994, c 186, §17; am L 1997, c 352, §23; am L 2005, c 50, §3]
